languages.text: Enemies that have failed a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} against any of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} will suffer an additional +{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} every time they suffer mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Противники, провалившие проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} любым {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилам{/g} псайкера, при каждом получении психического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} до конца боя будут получать +{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g} дополнительно.

traits.locale_text: Enemies that have failed a Willpower resistance test against any psychic power, used by the Psyker, until the end of combat will suffer an additional +<u>2×(psy rating)</u> mental damage every time they suffer mental damage.

Enemies that have failed a Willpower resistance test against any of the pysker's psychic powers will suffer an additional +<u>(2 × psy rating)</u> mental damage every time they suffer mental damage until the end of combat.

Enemies that have failed a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} against any of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} will suffer an additional +{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} every time they suffer mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat.

Enemies that have failed a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} against any of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} will suffer an additional +{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241} {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}direct damage{/g} every time they suffer mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat.

Enemies that have failed a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} against any of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} will suffer an additional +{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} every time they suffer mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat.

languages.text: Противники, провалившие проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} любым {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилам{/g} псайкера, при каждом получении психического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} до конца боя будут получать +{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g} дополнительно.
languages.original_text: Enemies that have failed a Willpower resistance test against any of the pysker's psychic powers will suffer an additional +<u>(2 × psy rating)</u> mental damage every time they suffer mental damage until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Противники, провалившие проверку Воли на сопротивление любым психосилам псайкера, при каждом получении психического урона до конца боя будут получать <u>(2 × пси-рейтинг)</u> психического урона дополнительно.

Противники, провалившие проверку Воли на сопротивление любым психосилам псайкера, при каждом получении психического урона до конца боя будут получать <u>(2 × пси-рейтинг)</u> психического урона дополнительно.

Противники, провалившие проверку Воли на сопротивление любым психосилам псайкера, при каждом получении психического урона до конца боя будут получать {uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241} психического урона дополнительно.

languages.text: 当敌人受到灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}影响，需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}时，若检定失败，则该名敌人每次受到{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}时，都会额外受到{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241}点精神{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Enemies that have failed a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} against any of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} will suffer an additional +{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} every time they suffer mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 当敌人受到灵能者的灵能力量影响，需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}时，若检定失败，则该名敌人每次受到精神伤害时，都会额外受到<u>（2×灵能等级）</u>点精神伤害，效果持续至战斗结束。
当敌人受到灵能者的灵能力量影响，需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}时，若检定失败，则该名敌人每次受到精神伤害时，都会额外受到{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241}点精神伤害，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Los enemigos que hayan fallado una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} contra cualquiera de los {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} del psíquico sufren +{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241} de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} adicional cada vez que sufran {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} mental hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: Enemies that have failed a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} against any of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} will suffer an additional +{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} every time they suffer mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Los enemigos que hayan fallado una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} contra cualquiera de los {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} del psíquico sufren +{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241} de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g} adicional cada vez que sufran {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño mental{/g} hasta el final del combate.

Los enemigos que hayan fallado una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} contra cualquiera de los poderes psíquicos del psíquico sufren +{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241} de daño mental adicional cada vez que sufran daño mental hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: Feinde, die bei einer {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} gegen eine der {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kräfte{/g} des Psionikers gescheitert sind, erleiden bis zum Ende des Kampfes jedes Mal, wenn sie Mental-{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erleiden, zusätzlich +{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: Enemies that have failed a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} against any of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} will suffer an additional +{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} every time they suffer mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Feinde, die bei einer {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} gegen eine der {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kräfte{/g} des Psionikers gescheitert sind, erleiden bis zum Ende des Kampfes jedes Mal, wenn sie {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Mentalschaden{/g} erhalten, zusätzlich +{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241} {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g}.

Feinde, die bei einer {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} gegen eine der psychischen Kräfte des Psionikers gescheitert sind, erleiden bis zum Ende des Kampfes jedes Mal, wenn sie Mentalschaden erhalten, zusätzlich +{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241} Mentalschaden.

languages.text: Les ennemis qui ont échoué à un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} contre l'un des {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} du psyker subissent +{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} chaque fois qu'ils subissent des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} mentaux jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: Enemies that have failed a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} against any of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} will suffer an additional +{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} every time they suffer mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Les ennemis qui ont échoué à un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} contre l'un des {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} du psyker subissent +{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} chaque fois qu'ils subissent des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} mentaux jusqu'à la fin du combat.

Les ennemis qui ont échoué à un {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}test de résistance{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Volonté{/g} contre l'un des pouvoirs psychiques du psyker subissent +{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241} points de dégâts mentaux supplémentaires chaque fois qu'ils subissent des dégâts mentaux jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: この異能者のいずれかの{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}に対する{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WIL{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗した敵は、戦闘終了まで精神{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける度に追加で+{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241}の{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: Enemies that have failed a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} against any of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} will suffer an additional +{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} every time they suffer mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: この異能者のいずれかの{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}に対する{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WIL{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗した敵は、戦闘終了まで精神{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける度に追加で+{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241}の{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を受ける。
この異能者のいずれかの超能力に対する{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗した敵は、戦闘終了まで精神ダメージを受ける度に追加で+{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241}の精神ダメージを受ける。

この異能者のいずれかの{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}に対する{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗した敵は、戦闘終了まで精神{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける度に追加で+{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241}の{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神ダメージ{/g}を受ける。

languages.text: Ruhsezerin herhangi bir {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücüne{/g} karşı girdiği {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçemeyen düşmanlar, çatışma sırasında her zihinsel {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} aldıklarında ilave +{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}doğrudan hasara{/g} maruz kalırlar.
languages.original_text: Enemies that have failed a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} against any of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} will suffer an additional +{uip|Damage|95b11cc99c294b35a151c89ba6805241} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} every time they suffer mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat.
